  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UndoListener, java.util.EventListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventHandler<ApplyEvent>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class MaskPane
extends AbstractEffectPane
    Implementation of a mask effect for the main image sequence.
